sentences.sContent: When people become newly infected with HIV, they often have a fever and minor illness at the time but rarely know what it is.
sentences.sCn: 当人们受艾滋病病毒重新感染时，他们常常同时有发烧和轻微不适，但很少知道它是什么。

sentences.sContent: Now they know how to fight it – by sleeping under insecticide-treated nets and seeking medical care at the dispensary when they have a fever.
sentences.sCn: 现在他们知道如何与该病作斗争 — 通过在经杀虫剂处理的蚊帐里睡觉和在发烧时到诊所寻求医疗。
